00028         struct SpellEffectParams
00029         {
00030             SpellEffectParams()
00031                 : mMagnMin(-1)
00032                 , mMagnMax(-1)
00033                 , mRange(-1)
00034                 , mDuration(-1)
00035                 , mSkill(-1)
00036                 , mAttribute(-1)
00037                 , mEffectID(-1)
00038                 , mNoTarget(false)
00039                 , mIsConstant(false)
00040             {
00041             }
00042 
00043             bool mNoTarget; // potion effects for example have no target (target is always the player)
00044             bool mIsConstant; // constant effect means that duration will not be displayed
00045 
00046             // value of -1 here means the effect is unknown to the player
00047             short mEffectID;
00048 
00049             // value of -1 here means there is no skill/attribute
00050             signed char mSkill, mAttribute;
00051 
00052             // value of -1 here means the value is unavailable
00053             int mMagnMin, mMagnMax, mRange, mDuration;
00054 
00055             bool operator==(const SpellEffectParams& other) const
00056             {
00057                 if (mEffectID !=  other.mEffectID)
00058                     return false;
00059 
00060                 bool involvesAttribute = (mEffectID == 74 // restore attribute
00061                                         || mEffectID == 85 // absorb attribute
00062                                         || mEffectID == 17 // drain attribute
00063                                         || mEffectID == 79 // fortify attribute
00064                                         || mEffectID == 22); // damage attribute
00065                 bool involvesSkill = (mEffectID == 78 // restore skill
00066                                         || mEffectID == 89 // absorb skill
00067                                         || mEffectID == 21 // drain skill
00068                                         || mEffectID == 83 // fortify skill
00069                                         || mEffectID == 26); // damage skill
00070                 return ((other.mSkill == mSkill) || !involvesSkill) && ((other.mAttribute == mAttribute) && !involvesAttribute);
00071             }
00072         };
00073 
00074         typedef std::vector<SpellEffectParams> SpellEffectList;
00075
